p: Many in vitro antibacterial studies have shown that ZRR had broad-spectrum antibacterial effects. The volatile oil from ZSE had an antibacterial effect on many kinds of bacteria, not only on the Gram-positive bacteria such as Staphylococcus aureus and Bacillus subtilis, but also on the Gram-negative bacteria such as Escherichia coli and Salmonella. In addition, volatile oil from ZRR had a stronger inhibiting ability to fungus compared with bacteria [ 60].
